mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Estate of W.H. Castle
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Estate of W.H. Castle Amanda E. Castle, Widow Albert M. Castle, Son Edward A. Castle, Son Linda Castle, Daughter William A. Castle , Son Walter T. Castle, Son E. A. Castle, Administrator Recorded in Ledger Book 5, Folio 36, in the Floyd County Courthouse. Date recorded as April 10th, 1899 term
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
